Key Match Events: Adolis Garcia hit a grand slam
Mitch Garver had a clutch game with three hits, including a key solo home run and RBI double
Nathan Eovaldi maintained his reputation as a big-game pitcher, allowing just two runs on five hits over 6.1 solid innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers continued the 'road-field advantage' trend of this ALCS
Game 7 of the 2023 ALCS will take place Monday at 8 p.m. ET on FOX and the FOX Sports App
Others: Astros fans make their displeasure known due to Bryan Abreu's pending two-game suspension for hitting Adolis Garcia in Game 5
Yordan Álvarez continued his hot hitting against Nathan Eovaldi
Incredible snag! Check out the grab that this fan dressed in LSU gear made on Garver's home run ball
Houston did not have a hit since the first inning as Nathan Eovaldi is through five one-run frames, as the Astros' stunning offensive struggles at home continue
The Astros finally got to Eovaldi again, pushing across another run in the sixth thanks to a Mauricio Dubón sacrifice fly to bring home Yordan Álvarez
Hector Neris got Corey Seager to ground out in the top of the seventh with two runners on, keeping the Astros' deficit at one run
Josh Sborz got Michael Brantley to ground into a double play with Alex Bregman and Yordan Álvarez on deck to maintain the Rangers' one-run lead
Just over 48 hours after their near-brawl may have played a huge role in the wild outcome of Game 5, Bryan Abreu struck out the Rangers slugger Adolis Garcia
Mitch Garver was having himself a game, as his RBI double gave the Rangers a key insurance run to make the score 4-2 in the eighth
Jose Leclerc walked Kyle Tucker to load the bases but got pinch-hitter Jon Singleton swinging to preserve the Rangers' lead
After Texas loaded the bases with nobody out, the Rangers got their fifth run of the game after Ryne Stanek, newly in the game, hit Corey Seager with a pitch

GARCIA IS GRAND: After getting booed all game due to his Game 5 home run, hit-by-pitch and bench-clearing incident, Adolis Garcia answered Astros fans in a big way — with a line-drive grand slam into the Crawford Boxes
Historical comparisons or records beyond: This is the 100th meeting between the two teams
